item.title: Attack speed timers?
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

ok i need help with my timers… like ppl in combat can attack really fast… massing i guess, and i want to slow it down to more of a real rs speed so ppl can’t do that

ive been told to search for
Code:

actiontimer = o

but there is sooo many. and the ones i have changed make no difference in the speed that someone attacks, so can someone plz tell me what timer(s) to change? and to a more realistic number, as i said closer to a rs speed?

for example if done this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip { PkingDelay = 30; wepdelay = 30; resetanim = 30; }

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip { PkingDelay = 13; wepdelay = 13; resetanim = 13; }

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip { PkingDelay = 5; wepdelay = 5; resetanim = 5; }
all 3 of these are in my client.java

ive changed all 3 sets of timers all around so many difffernt ways and they don’t stop ppl from attacking super fast…

there has to be a way… cuz czar sources attack speeds are slow and it don’t matter how many times or how fast someone clicks it stays the same speed…

Read full topic
